/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC   -g  -Wl,--no-undefined -lc    -shared -Wl,-soname,libvtkCommonSystem-7.1.so.1 -o ../../lib/libvtkCommonSystem-7.1.so.1 CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkClientSocket.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkDirectory.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkServerSocket.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkSocket.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkSocketCollection.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkThreadMessager.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkTimerLog.cxx.o ../../lib/libvtkCommonCore-7.1.so.1 ../../lib/libvtksys-7.1.so.1 -lpthread -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/nknapp/dfnworks-main/inp_2_vtk/VTK-7.1.0/lib:
